turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like you to order me two pizzas from Napoli's please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what would you like on them or do you prefer them plain?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like one with Meatball and onion, and the other I would like with pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, are these both large pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, both large please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, do you want anything in addition to the pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please order two dozen mild buffalo wings.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, would you like anything to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that sounds like a good idea. Please order 2 bottles of Pepsi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, just to make sure I have the order correct, I'm going to repeat it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Two large pizzas, one with meatball and onion and one with pepperoni. You would also like 2 dozen mild buffalo wings and two bottles of Pepsi. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, thank you very much. I appreciate the help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should I put this on your account with them or would you like to use a different method of payment?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please put it on my account with them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I will place the order and get back to you with the details.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you again.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I have placed the order, and it will be ready for pick-up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I told them to send you the receipt via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're very welcome.

items.name: Okay, I have placed the order
